messages.title: Labour School Closure Shame!
messages.content: The closure of Ewing School confirmed as Labour's Town Hall bosses admit to 'two year deception'.

messages.title: Betrayed
messages.content: Local campaigner Bill Fisher says: 'It's absolutely unacceptable that Leech MP hasn't stopped the closure of a single school in Manchester. It’s a disgrace.'

messages.title: Truancy worst in country under Labour
messages.content: Statistics show truancy in Manchester is twice as bad as the national average.

messages.title: Labour have failed on education
messages.content: Local Campaigner and former Head Teacher, Anne Grahamshaw writes: 'Labour clearly has no control over education in Manchester. The result is falling standards in our schools.'

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Gerald Kaufman, Lucy Powell, Tony Lloyd, Gerald Kaufman (again)

issues.education: Labour's Town Hall bosses admit to 'two year deception'. Statistics show truancy in Manchester is twice as bad as the national average. Labour clearly has no control over education in Manchester. The result is falling standards in our schools.

contactInformation.address: Councillor John Leech, FREEPOST NAT 13685, Manchester, M20 7ZZ.

quotes.text: It's absolutely unacceptable that Leech MP hasn't stopped the closure of a single school in Manchester. It’s a disgrace.
Labour clearly has no control over education in Manchester. The result is falling standards in our schools.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Some text in the leaflet is not fully legible and hence not included in the structure. For more detailed policies and specific mentions, the actual texts would be required as a clearer source.
